    • checkEmail

      public boolean checkEmail(String emailField)
      The checkEmail method checks if a given string is a valid email address. The method uses a regular expression to validate the email address.
      Parameters:
      emailField - The string to be checked if it is a valid email address.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the given string is a valid email address, false otherwise.
